src_original: tatra /  atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /  kutaḥ? hiryasmāt /  tadatītā nāgataṃ cittaṃ na vidyate,
na saṃpratyasti,  naṣṭājātatvāt /  yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /  yadanāgatam,  tadapyasaṃprāptamiti /
pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-  athotpannamahaṃ cittaṃ naṣṭe 'sminnāstyahaṃ punaḥ // Bca_9.74 //  yathā utpannaṃ vartamānaṃ cittamahamastu,  tadapi na yuktam /
yato naṣṭe 'sminnāstyahaṃ punaḥ,  asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
yathaiva kadalīstambho na kaścidbhāgaśaḥ kṛtaḥ /  tathāhamapyasadbhūto mṛgyamāṇo vicārataḥ // Bca_9.75 //  (Bcp 228)  yathaiva kadalīstambho rambhādaṇḍakhaṇḍam,
